name: PayPal
description: Integrate with PayPal to list, create, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Transactions
tools.description: List PayPal transactions within a date range. Returns transaction IDs, amounts, statuses, and payer info.

tools.name: Create Payment
tools.description: Create a PayPal payment order. Specify the amount, currency, and intent. Returns an order ID and approval URL.

tools.name: Get Order
tools.description: Retrieve details of a PayPal order by its ID. Returns order status, amounts, and payer information.

tools.name: Create Payout
tools.description: Create a PayPal batch payout to send money to one or more recipients via email.

tools.name: List Disputes
tools.description: List PayPal payment disputes. Optionally filter by status or date range. Returns dispute IDs, reasons, and amounts.

sandbox.label: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: Use PayPal sandbox environment for testing
